name: ModelTrain
description:
Runs a training campaign. 
Requires that a model has been set up (to train from scratch) or loaded (to continue training).

inputParameters.name: wb
inputParameters.description: Weights&Biases: username or team name. If not set, W&B will not be used.

inputParameters.name: run
inputParameters.description: Set to True to start training.

outputParameters.name: best_ckpt
outputParameters.description: Filename of the best performing checkpoint.
